channel.title: Please help!
channel.description:
Okay first of all, I have hosted before and this has never happened.
Just to say, I can log on 0.0.0.0 but not on my ip i have set up (runelife.no-ip.biz) and i don't know what to do...
problem 1 - port forwarding gone wrong
ok its a msc router and its got a rule
problem 2 - no-ip is wrong (not sure how)
i don't think this can be wrong but oh well
problem 3 - the runserver
this is the least likely to be wrong but it says its only being hosted locally (letting only my computer log on) so might as well screenie it
problem 4 - the paths
they r up to date so its not them...
p.s. unless u r going to tell me something useful pleasedon't post

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @adumus adumus
item.description:
@adumus wrote:

no[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2008, 01:23:34 PM[/size][hr]ok i will try to connect using a new ip and see if runelocus says my server is up

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

Well if you try to connect to your own server with the no-ip address you cant connect. Thats normal.
But can others connect?

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @adumus adumus
item.description:
@adumus wrote:

please some1 help, i can;t find anything

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Then your only problem is No-ip is not working right. Are you sure you completely removed all old components of No-ip, before reinstalling it? Maybe try talking to someone on the No-IP website about your error because I don’t know how to fix it. Sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @adumus adumus
item.description:
@adumus wrote:

done, still won’t open[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2008, 08:50:04 AM[/size][hr]help…

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Hmm thats probably the reason you can’t get on… Try uninstalling No-ip and then reinstalling it. But make sure to remember your No-ip address. See if that works. Then come back here.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Okay you have No-ip open right? And the smiley face is smiling with red cheeks right? Which means your all up to date right?

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Okay so you are trying to host the server so other people can get on right at this moment? Just to make sure I’m reading this right.

Read full topic
